sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function PostsCard({ data }) { return (
{data.categories}
{data.title}

{data.description.toString().split(' ').length > 15 ? data.description.toString().split(' ').slice(0, 15).join(' ') + '...' : data.description}

By: {data.username}

Created: {data.createdAt}

); }
